text: Thomas Spurgeon (20 September 1856â€“October 1917) was a British Reformed Baptist preacher. He was the pastor of the Metropolitan Tabernacle. He was one of two non-identical twin sons of the famous Charles Haddon Spurgeon (1834-1892). ==References== Category:1837 births Category:1917 deaths Category:Baptist ministers Category:Calvinists Category:Charles Spurgeon Category:English Protestants Category:Evangelists Category:Twin people
title: Thomas Spurgeon
